title: Using Capital Letters at the Start of Sentences
subject: Grammar
objective: Students will learn to capitalize the first word in a sentence and the word 'I'.

lessonFlow.content: Let's learn how to use big letters at the start of a sentence!

rules.rule: Always start a sentence with a capital letter.

questions.question: ___ went to school.
questions.explanation: Try to talk about yourself and remeber to capitilize!

lessonFlow.instruction: Write a sentence that starts with a capital letter and uses 'I'.

lessonFlow.message: Nice work! Now you know when to use big letters!
